wishes.title: Adventure Theme
wishes.message: May your birthday be the start of a year filled with wonderful adventures and exciting journeys! Wishing you happiness in all your endeavors.

wishes.title: Joy Theme
wishes.message: Wishing you a birthday overflowing with happiness, laughter, and joy that lasts throughout the coming year! May all your dreams come true.

wishes.title: Success Theme
wishes.message: May your birthday mark the beginning of your most successful year yet! Wishing you achievements, prosperity, and fulfillment in all you do.

wishes.title: Friendship Theme
wishes.message: On your special day, I want you to know how much you mean to me. Wishing you a birthday as wonderful as the friendship we share!

wishes.title: Love Theme
wishes.message: Happy birthday to someone who makes my world brighter every day! May your birthday be as special and beautiful as you are to me.
